body:
Yeah erojin this is just very dark and depressing for a random shota doujin. 

Kscythe, the japanese police literally don’t give a shit and do jack. Especially if the guy has connections. Add onto that the cultural pushes to just be a silent victim and not make any noise, and well, this doujin is sadly kind of realistic.

Idk why not call the police if you get raped?
somany jp manga use this plot like it normal to not call someone for help.
This is just sad for the girl. Her job was taken over by a douchebag and she became a NEET. There's need repercussion against this type of cold hard employee checks
